H0.text: what type of government does iraq have now. Monarchy

H1.text: what type of government does iraq have now. Theocracy

H2.text: what type of government does iraq have now. Confederacy

H3.text: what type of government does iraq have now. Republic

A4.text: The federal government of Iraq is defined under the current Constitution, approved in 2005, as a democratic, parliamentary republic with Islam as the official state religion.

A5.text: The Constitution of Iraq defines the federal government as a democratic, parliamentary republic.
